required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Single Dose Study of SHR4640 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study to Evaluate Safety, Tolerability, Food Effect, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of Single Doses of SHR4640 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of the study is to assess the safety, tolerance, food effect, pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic properties of single dose adminstration of SHR4640 in healthy volunteers.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Clinical significant changes from baseline up to to Day 15; from baseline up to Day 19 for 7.5mg dose group

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to day 4; up to day 11 for 7.5mg dose group

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to day 4; up to day 11 for 7.5mg dose group
up to day 4; up to day 11 for 7.5mg dose group

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to the peak plasma concentration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to day 4; up to day 11 for 7.5mg dose group

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmax of SHR4640 dosed after high-fat meal in 7.5mg dose group
AUC of SHR4640 dosed after high-fat meal in 7.5mg dose group
T1/2 of SHR4640 dosed after high-fat meal in 7.5mg dose group
Tmax of SHR4640 dosed after high-fat meal in 7.5mg dose group
Changes in serum uric acid concentration from baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to day 4; up to day 11 for 7.5mg dose group
secondary_outcome.description: absolute and percent changes in serum acid concentration

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in urinary uric acid excretion from baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to day 4; up to day 11 for 7.5mg dose group
secondary_outcome.description: percent changes in urinary uric acid excretion from baseline
